name: The International Congress on Psychiatry
content: The International Congress on Psychiatry (CP 2020) Website：https://www.confjune.org/conference/CP2020/ Date：May 29-31, 2020 Venue：Ramada Xiamen Hotel, Xiamen, China Online Registration Entrance：https://www.confjune.org/RegistrationSubmission/default.aspx?ConferenceID=1250 The International Congress on Psychiatry (CP 2020) will be held from May 29-31, 2020 in Xiamen, China. CP 2020 will cover issues on Mental Health and Well-being,Research, Education and Case Studies on Mental Health,Neuroscience Nursing and Neurosurgery,Stress, Anxiety and Depression,Self-harm and Suicide Prevention . It dedicates to creating a stage for exchanging the latest research results and sharing the advanced research methods. Attendance Methods 1\. Submit full paper ( Regular Attendance + Paper Publication + Presentation ) You are welcome to submit full paper through Online Registration System. All the accepted papers will be published by a peer-reviewed open access journal and submitted to CNKI and Google Scholar for indexing. 2.Submit abstract ( Regular Attendance + Abstract + Presentation ) You are welcome to submit abstract for oral presentation or poster presentation. 3.Regular Attendance ( No Submission Required ) You're also welcome to attend our conference (without submitting full paper or abstract) Contact Us Email: confws6@163.com Tel: +86 151 7247 9625 QQ:1349406763 Wechat: 3025797047
